creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: green diamond and chevron woven and embroidered stripes, some with pink, 1/2" diamonds within; very narrow red stripes within chervrons; 3-5" warp fringe at both ends; fringe is knotted at very end
dimension: 32 x 8 3/4 in. (81.28 x 22.23 cm) (length including fringe)
title: Head Scarf
